name: Void (itch) (FlamingSparrow)
description:
Welcome to VOID!

You control a little cube that has to try to get to the portal. It's as simple as that! Or is it?
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
You can use ARROW KEYS to move, but once the little guy gets going, he can't stop until he hits a wall!

You can press SPACE to cross dimensions, opening up many new possibilities to explore!

There are also the GREEN GATES and the corresponding RED BUTTONS which close them. They're easy. Just touch the red buttons and the doors will either open or close.

Later on, there will be SPINNERS and BLUE BUTTONS that stop/start the spinners. The spinners don't do anything when they're spinning, but when they stop they block your path and don't let you across.

Good Luck!

Made using the Scratch engine!
